TopicTitle: Why were the forums down so long?

Articles.Content: This may sound like a rude question but why were the forums down for the length of time they were. Is a server migration supposed to take that long? The length of time was extremely conspicuous.

This may sound like a rude question but why were the forums down for the length of time they were. Is a server migration supposed to take that long? The length of time was extremely conspicuous.

Well, there was A LOT of Data to transfer,

And the old servers were kind of slow, so it took a long time to get the off of them.
